item.title: Abort
item.description: Stops the execution of a list of ACTIONS in a RULE.

item.title: AbortIf
item.description: Stops the execution of a list of ACTIONS in a RULE if the provided Bool is True. Otherwise, the execution continues with the remaining ACTIONS. Inputs Bool

item.title: AbsoluteValue
item.description: Returns the unsigned value of the provided Number input. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: Add
item.description: Returns the sum of two Number or two Vector values. Inputs Number | Vector Number | Vector Output Number | Vector

item.title: And
item.description: Returns a Bool value based on whether both of the provided inputs return True. Inputs Bool Bool Output Bool

item.title: AngleBetweenVectors
item.description: Returns the angle (in degrees) between two provided Vector values. Inputs Vector Vector Output Number

item.title: AngleDifference
item.description: Returns the difference between two angles (in degrees). Inputs Number (1st Angle) Number (2nd Angle) Output Number

item.title: AppendToArray
item.description: Returns a copy of an Array with the provided value appended to the end. Note: It is not possible for an array to contain arrays. Attempting to append an array to an array will concatenate them instead. Inputs Array Any Type Output Array

item.title: ApplyMedGadget
item.description: Applies the effect of a medical gadget to a target Player. Inputs Player MedGadgetTypesItem

item.title: ArccosineInDegrees
item.description: Returns the inverse cosine of a provided Number value in degrees. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: ArccosineInRadians
item.description: Returns the inverse cosine of a provided Number value in radians. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: ArcsineInDegrees
item.description: Returns the inverse sine of a provided Number value in degrees. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: ArcsineInRadians
item.description: Returns the inverse sine of a provided Number value in radians. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: ArctangentInDegrees
item.description: Returns the inverse tangent of a provided Number value in degrees. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: ArctangentInRadians
item.description: Returns the inverse tangent of a provided Number value in radians. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: ArrayContains
item.description: Returns a Bool value based on whether the provided Array contains the provided value. Inputs Array Any Type Output Bool

item.title: ArraySlice
item.description: Returns a copy of the specified Array containing only values from a specified index range. Inputs Array Number (Start Index) Number (Count) Output Array

item.title: BackwardVector
item.description: Returns the backward directional Vector of (0, 0, 1). Output Vector

item.title: Bool
item.description: A Bool is fancy game developer talk for a True or False value. This type is used to define or identify the state of a variety of things. Is a player currently prone? Is the player using a specific soldier? Can players not score points because of some custom condition?

item.title: Break
item.description: Breaks and exits the execution of a looping block, such as While or LoopVariable.

item.title: CapturePointCapturingTime
item.description: Sets the capturing time for target CapturePoint to the provided Number. Inputs CapturePoint Number

item.title: CapturePointNeutralizationTime
item.description: Sets the neutralization time for target CapturePoint to the provided Number. Inputs CapturePoint Number

item.title: CapturePoints
item.description: Returns a CapturePointsItem from the collection of all possible capture points. Output CapturePointsItem

item.title: ClearAllCustomMessages
item.description: Clears all custom messages for a provided Player or TeamId. If no Player or TeamId is provided, it will clear all custom messages for everyone. Inputs Player | TeamId (Group) Optional

item.title: ClearCustomMessage
item.description: Clears text from the provided CustomMessageSlotsItem for the provided Player or TeamId. If no Player or TeamId is given, it clears all players text at that CustomMessageSlotsItem. Inputs CustomMessageSlotsItem Player | TeamId (Group) Optional

item.title: ClosestPlayerTo
item.description: Returns the closest alive Player to a provided position. Can be filtered using a TeamId. Note: If no players are alive when this block is called, the returned Player will be invalid. Inputs Vector (Position) TeamId Optional Output Player

item.title: CompareCapturePoint
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the target CapturePoint has the same designation as the provided CapturePointsItem. Inputs CapturePoint CapturePointsItem Output Bool

item.title: CompareVehicleName
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the target Vehicle has the same name as the provided VehiclesItem or if it is the same type as the provided VehicleTypesItem. Inputs Vehicle VehiclesItem | VehicleTypesItem Output Bool

item.title: CONDITION
item.description: Evaluates the condition to run a RULE or SUBROUTINE block based on the Bool input. Inputs Bool

item.title: Continue
item.description: Forces the execution of a looping block (such as While or LoopVariable) to the start of the next iteration of that block.

item.title: Control_If
item.description: The start of a conditional control block whose ACTIONS will execute if its condition is True. Inputs Bool

item.title: CosineFromDegrees
item.description: Returns the cosine value of a specified angle in degrees. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: CosineFromRadians
item.description: Returns the cosine value of a specified angle in radians. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: CountOf
item.description: Returns the Number of elements in the specified Array. Inputs Array Output Number

item.title: CreateVector
item.description: Returns a Vector composed of three provided ‘X’ (left), ‘Y’ (up), and ‘Z’ (forward) values. Inputs Number (X Value) Number (Y Value) Number (Z Value) Output Vector

item.title: CrossProduct
item.description: Returns the cross product between two Vector values. If the two Vector inputs are parallel, the result will be zero. Inputs Vector Vector Output Vector

item.title: CurrentArrayElement
item.description: Returns a reference to the current Array element being evaluated. Only used for FilteredArray, MappedArray, SortedArray, IsTrueForAll, and IsTrueForAny. Output Any Type

item.title: CustomMessageSlot
item.description: Returns a CustomMessageSlotsItem which can be used with DisplayCustomMessage and ClearCustomMessage to display information on screen to players. Output CustomMessageSlotsItem

item.title: DamageTypes
item.description: Returns a DamageTypesItem from the collection of all possible damage types. Output DamageTypesItem

item.title: DamageVehicle
item.description: Damages the target Vehicle by the provided Number amount. Inputs Vehicle Number

item.title: DealDamage
item.description: Deals a provided amount of damage to a target Player by a another Player. Inputs Player (Target) Number Player (Giver) Optional

item.title: DeathTypes
item.description: Returns a DeathTypesItem from the collection of all possible death types. Output DeathTypesItem

item.title: DeployAllPlayers
item.description: Force spawns all players in the deploy screen.

item.title: DeployPlayer
item.description: Deploys a target Player onto the battlefield from the deploy screen. Inputs Player

item.title: DestroyVehicle
item.description: Destroys the target Vehicle. Inputs Vehicle

item.title: DirectionFromAngles
item.description: Returns a directional Vector from the provided horizontal (yaw) and vertical (pitch) angles (in degrees). Inputs Number (Horizontal) Number (Vertical) Output Vector

item.title: DirectionTowards
item.description: Returns the direction, or normalized Vector, from a starting position and ending position. Inputs Vector (Starting Position) Vector (Ending Position) Output Vector

item.title: DisplayCustomMessage
item.description: Display a Message on-screen in the upper right corner. Using the CustomMessageSlotsItem, this Message can be displayed on multiple lines. It will stay up for the length of the provided duration, or stay up indefinitely if a negative Number is provided. It will be displayed to everyone unless a specific Player or TeamId is provided. Note: It’s your responsibility to ensure a safe and fair experience for others, violating the EA User Agreement by using offensive or inappropriate text may result in account bans.

item.title: DisplayGameModeMessage
item.description: Displays a Message on the top center of the screen for 6 seconds. If no target is provided, the Message will display to everyone. Note: This will only appear to players that are deployed on the map. It’s your responsibility to ensure a safe and fair experience for others, violating the EA User Agreement by using offensive or inappropriate text may result in account bans. Inputs Message Player | TeamId Optional

item.title: DisplayHighlightedWorldLogMessage
item.description: Displays a Message on the world log above the minimap for 6 seconds. If no target is provided, it will display the Message to everyone. Note: This will only appear to players that are deployed on the map. It’s your responsibility to ensure a safe and fair experience for others, violating the EA User Agreement by using offensive or inappropriate text may result in account bans. Inputs Message Player | TeamId Optional

item.title: DisplayNotificationMessage
item.description: Displays a notification-type Message on the top-right of the screen for 6 seconds. If no target is provided, it will display the Message to everyone. Note: It’s your responsibility to ensure a safe and fair experience for others, violating the EA User Agreement by using offensive or inappropriate text may result in account bans. Inputs Message Player | TeamId Optional

item.title: DistanceBetween
item.description: Returns the distance between a starting position and ending position. Inputs Vector (Starting Position) Vector (Ending Position) Output Number

item.title: Divide
item.description: Returns the ratio between two Number values or a Vector and Number value. A Vector divided by a Number will yield a scaled Vector. Inputs Number | Vector Number Output Number | Vector

item.title: DotProduct
item.description: Returns the dot product between two Vector values. If the two values are orthogonal to each other, the result will be zero. Inputs Vector Vector Output Number

item.title: DownVector
item.description: Returns the downward directional Vector of (0, -1, 0). Output Vector

item.title: Else
item.description: The start of a block of ACTIONS that will execute if all previous If and ElseIf conditions are False.

item.title: ElseIf
item.description: The start of a block of ACTIONS that will run if its condition is True and all previous If or ElseIf conditions are False. Inputs Bool

item.title: EmptyArray
item.description: Returns an initialized empty Array. Output Array

item.title: EnableAllInputRestrictions
item.description: Enables or disables all keyboard and mouse inputs - such as movement, firing, and turning - for a target Player. Inputs Player Bool

item.title: EnableAllPlayerDeploy
item.description: Enables or disables spawning from the deploy screen for all players. Inputs Bool

item.title: EnableCapturePointDeploying
item.description: Enables or disables deploying on provided CapturePoint for the team that owns it. Inputs CapturePoint Bool

item.title: EnableCapturing
item.description: Enables or disables capturing a provided CapturePoint. Inputs CapturePoint Bool

item.title: EnableDefaultGameModeScoring
item.description: Enables or disables default gamemode scoring logic, which refers to the base gamemode’s scoring rules. For instance, disabling this rule will remove ticket bleed from Conquest or add one point for kills in Free-for-All. Disable this if you want to implement your own custom scoring logic. Inputs Bool

item.title: EnableDefaultGameModeWinCondition
item.description: Enables or disables the gamemode’s default win condition logic. The win condition is checked when the time limit is reached or when a team or player reaches the target score. Disable this if you want to trigger your own win condition. Inputs Bool

item.title: EnableGameModeObjective
item.description: Enables or disables the provided CapturePoint or MCOM. Note: MCOMs are only available on TDM, VTDM, and Custom Conquest layouts. Inputs CapturePoint | MCOM Bool

item.title: EnableHQ
item.description: Enables or disables a headquarters specified by the provided TeamId and Number index. Note: The index begins counting at 0. Inputs TeamId Number (Index) Bool

item.title: EnableInputRestriction
item.description: Enables or disables a specified InputRestrictionsItem on a target Player. Inputs Player InputRestrictionsItem Bool

item.title: EnablePlayerDeploy
item.description: Enables or disables the ability for a target Player to deploy. Inputs Player Bool

item.title: EnableTicketBleedAcceleration
item.description: Enables or disables ticket bleed acceleration for both teams. Ticket bleed acceleration is on by default and only comes into effect if one team owns all sectors for about 60 seconds. Inputs Bool

item.title: EnableVOMessaging
item.description: Enables or disables the gamemode voice-over (VO) text and audio messaging, such as announcements about sector majority and capture points. Note: This function is enabled by default. Inputs Bool

item.title: EnableWorldIconImage
item.description: Enables or disables the image for a provided WorldIconsItem. Inputs WorldIconsItem Bool

item.title: EnableWorldIconText
item.description: Enables or disables the text for a provided WorldIconsItem. Note: There is no default text, and will need to be set before or after this property is enabled to appear. Inputs WorldIconsItem Bool

item.title: EndGameMode
item.description: Ends the current gamemode and designates the provided Player or TeamId as the winner. The gamemode ends in draw if TeamId is set to 0. Inputs TeamId | Player

item.title: Equals
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if two values are equal to each other. Inputs Any Type Any Type Output Bool

item.title: EventCapturePoint
item.description: Returns the CapturePoint payload from the RULE EVENT context. Output CapturePoint

item.title: EventDamageType
item.description: Returns the DamageType of the victim from the OnPlayerDamaged EVENT context. Output DamageType

item.title: EventDeathType
item.description: Returns the DeathType of the victim from the OnPlayerDied or OnPlayerEarnedKill EVENT context. Output DeathType

item.title: EventMCOM
item.description: Returns a MCOM payload from the RULE EVENT context. Output MCOM

item.title: EventOtherPlayer
item.description: Returns the 2nd Player payload from the RULE EVENT context. Output Player

item.title: EventPlayer
item.description: Returns the 1st Player payload from the RULE EVENT context. Output Player

item.title: EventSeat
item.description: Returns the Number seat index payload of a Vehicle from the RULE EVENT context. Output Number

item.title: EventTeam
item.description: Returns the TeamId payload from the Ongoing Team EVENT context. Output TeamId

item.title: EventVehicle
item.description: Returns the Vehicle payload from the RULE EVENT context. Output Vehicle

item.title: EventWeapon
item.description: Returns the HardwareId of the weapon used to kill the victim from the OnPlayerDied or OnPlayerEarnedKill EVENT context. Output HardwareId

item.title: Factions
item.description: Returns a FactionsItem from the collection of all available factions. Output FactionsItem

item.title: FarthestPlayerFrom
item.description: Returns the farthest alive Player from a provided position. Can be filtered using a TeamId. Note: If no players are alive when this block is called, the returned Player will be invalid. Inputs Vector (Position) TeamId Optional Output Player

item.title: FilteredArray
item.description: Returns a filtered version of the specified Array based on the condition provided. This block cycles through the entire array. You can utilize the CurrentArrayElement block to represent the element in the Array for each iteration. For an Array like GetPlayers, CurrentArrayElement would represent each Player in that Array. You can then build your filter condition based on a property of that Player (like score, or some custom player Variable value).

item.title: FirstOf
item.description: Returns the first value of the specified Array. Inputs Array Output Any Type

item.title: ForceAllExitVehicle
item.description: Forces all players to exit the target Vehicle. Inputs Vehicle

item.title: ForceMandown
item.description: Puts the target Player into the mandown state (unless mandown is disabled). Inputs Player

item.title: ForcePlayerExitVehicle
item.description: Forces the specified Player to exit the target Vehicle. Inputs Player Vehicle

item.title: ForcePlayerToSeat
item.description: Forces the specified Player into the target Vehicle at the provided seat Number. Note: If the provided index is -1, that Player will be forced into the first available seat. Inputs Player Vehicle Number

item.title: ForceRevive
item.description: Revives a target Player that is in the mandown state. Inputs Player

item.title: ForceSwitchInventory
item.description: Forces the target Player to switch to the provided PlayerInventorySlotsItem. Inputs Player PlayerInventorySlotsItem

item.title: ForwardVector
item.description: Returns the forward directional Vector of (0, 0, -1). Output Vector

item.title: GetAllCapturePoints
item.description: Returns an Array of all capture points within a game. Output Array

item.title: GetAllMCOMs
item.description: Returns an Array of all MCOMs within a game. Output Array

item.title: GetAllPlayersInVehicle
item.description: Returns a Array of all players inside a provided Vehicle Inputs Vehicle Output Array

item.title: GetAllVehicles
item.description: Returns an Array of all vehicles within a game. Output Array

item.title: GetCapturePointPosition
item.description: Returns the in-world position of the provided CapturePoint. Inputs CapturePoint Output Vector

item.title: GetCaptureProgress
item.description: Returns a Number from zero to one corresponding to the capture progress of the provided CapturePoint. Inputs CapturePoint Output Number

item.title: GetCurrentOwnerTeamID
item.description: Returns the current owner TeamId corresponding to the provided CapturePoint. Inputs CapturePoint Output TeamId

item.title: GetGameModeScore
item.description: Returns the current gamemode score of the provided Player or TeamId. Inputs Player | TeamId Output Number

item.title: GetGameModeTargetScore
item.description: Returns the gamemode target score needed for victory. Output Number

item.title: GetGameModeTimeElapsed
item.description: Returns the total elapsed time of the current gamemode. Output Number

item.title: GetGameModeTimeLimit
item.description: Returns the time limit set for the gamemode (in seconds). Output Number

item.title: GetGameModeTimeRemaining
item.description: Returns the amount of time left (seconds) in the current gamemode. Output Number

item.title: GetInventoryAmmo
item.description: Returns the target Player loaded ammo of the provided PlayerInventorySlotsItem. Inputs Player PlayerInventorySlotsItem Output Number

item.title: GetInventoryMagazineAmmo
item.description: Returns the target Player magazine ammo of the provided PlayerInventorySlotsItem. Inputs Player PlayerInventorySlotsItem Output Number

item.title: GetMCOMState
item.description: Returns the value of the target MCOM state. Inputs MCOM MCOMStateBoolItem Output Bool

item.title: GetObjective
item.description: Returns the CapturePoint or MCOM corresponding to the provided CapturePointsItem or MCOMsItem respectively. Inputs CapturePointsItem Output CapturePoint

item.title: GetOwnerProgressTeamID
item.description: Returns the TeamId of the team currently capturing the provided CapturePoint. Inputs CapturePoint Output TeamId

item.title: GetPlayerDeaths
item.description: Returns the total amount of deaths for the target Player. Inputs Player Output Number

item.title: GetPlayerFromVehicleSeat
item.description: Returns the Player currently occupying the provided seat index Number of the provided Vehicle. Note: If no players are in the vehicle seat when this block is called, the returned Player will be invalid. Inputs Vehicle Number Output Player

item.title: GetPlayerKills
item.description: Returns the total amount of kills for the target Player. Inputs Player Output Number

item.title: GetPlayers
item.description: Returns an Array of all players within a game. Output Array

item.title: GetPlayersOnPoint
item.description: Returns a Array of all players within the boundaries of a provided CapturePoint. Inputs CapturePoint Output Array

item.title: GetPlayerState
item.description: Returns the value of the target Player state. Inputs Player PlayerStateBoolItem | PlayerStateNumberItem | PlayerStateVectorItem Output Bool | Number | Vector

item.title: GetPlayerVehicleSeat
item.description: Returns the seat index Number for the target Player if they are in a vehicle, otherwise returns -1. Inputs Player Output Number

item.title: GetPreviousOwnerTeamID
item.description: Returns the previous owner TeamId corresponding to the provided CapturePoint. Inputs CapturePoint Output TeamId

item.title: GetRemainingFuseTime
item.description: Returns the remaining fuse time (in seconds) on the provided MCOM. Inputs MCOM Output Number

item.title: GetSeatCount
item.description: Returns the Number of seats in a Vehicle. Inputs Vehicle Output Number

item.title: GetSubroutineArgument
item.description: Returns the value of the argument that is passed into the SUBROUTINE. The list of available parameters will populate once this block is placed inside the SUBROUTINE. Output Any Type

item.title: GetTeamId
item.description: Returns the TeamId value of the specified Player OR the corresponding TeamId of the provided Number. Inputs Player | Number Output TeamId

item.title: GetVariable
item.description: Returns the value of a Variable. Inputs Variable Output Any Type

item.title: GetVehicleFromPlayer
item.description: Returns the Vehicle used by a Player. Inputs Player Output Vehicle

item.title: GetVehicleState
item.description: Returns the value of the target Vehicle state. Inputs Vehicle VehicleStateVectorItem Output Vector

item.title: GetVehicleTeamId
item.description: Returns the TeamId of the provided Vehicle. Note: A Vehicle that is not occupied will have a neutral TeamId. Inputs Vehicle Output TeamId

item.title: GetXComponent
item.description: Returns the ‘X’ component of a provided Vector. Inputs Vector Output Number

item.title: GetYComponent
item.description: Returns the ‘Y’ component of a provided Vector. Inputs Vector Output Number

item.title: GetZComponent
item.description: Returns the ‘Z’ component of a provided Vector. Inputs Vector Output Number

item.title: GreaterThan
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the 1st provided value is greater than the 2nd provided value. Inputs Number Number Output Bool

item.title: GreaterThanEqualTo
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the 1st provided value is greater than the 2nd provided value. Inputs Number Number Output Bool

item.title: HasInventory
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the provided Player has the specified ability. Inputs Player InventoryPrimaryWeaponsItem | InventorySecondaryWeaponsItem | InventoryCharacterSpecialtiesItem | InventoryOpenGadgetsItem | InventoryThrowablesItem | InventoryMeleeWeaponsItem Output Bool

item.title: Heal
item.description: Instantly adds a given amount of health to the target Player applied by a healer Player. Note: When healing a player with a max health multiplier not equal to 1, the amount of health they receive will scale with their max health multiplier value. Inputs Player (Target) Number Player (Healer) Optional

item.title: If
item.description: A special block which evaluates conditions to control the flow of ACTIONS in the If, Else If, and Else branches.

item.title: IfThenElse
item.description: Returns the 1st provided value if the condition is True, otherwise, returns the 2nd provided value. Inputs Bool Any Type (Output Value if the Condition is True) Any Type (Output Value if the Condition is False) Output Any Type

item.title: IndexOfArrayValue
item.description: Returns the index of an Array value. Inputs Array Any Type Output Number

item.title: InputRestrictions
item.description: Returns a InputRestrictionsItem from the collection of all inputs which can be restricted with EnableInputRestriction. Output InputRestrictionsItem

item.title: InventoryCharacterSpecialties
item.description: Returns an InventoryCharacterSpecialtiesItem from the collection of all character specialties. Output InventoryCharacterSpecialtiesItem

item.title: InventoryMeleeWeapons
item.description: Returns an InventoryMeleeWeaponsItem from the collection of all melee weapons. Output InventoryMeleeWeaponsItem

item.title: InventoryOpenGadgets
item.description: Returns an InventoryOpenGadgetsItem from the collection of all open gadgets. Output InventoryOpenGadgetsItem

item.title: InventoryPrimaryWeapons
item.description: Returns an InventoryPrimaryWeaponsItem from the collection of all primary weapons. Output InventoryPrimaryWeaponsItem

item.title: InventorySecondaryWeapons
item.description: Returns an InventorySecondaryWeaponsItem from the collection of all secondary weapons. Output InventorySecondaryWeaponsItem

item.title: InventoryThrowables
item.description: Returns a InventoryThrowablesItem from the collection of all throwables. Output InventoryThrowablesItem

item.title: IsCurrentMap
item.description: Returns True if the provided MapsItem is the name of the current map. Inputs MapsItem Output Bool

item.title: IsFaction
item.description: Returns True if the provided TeamId is using soldiers from the specified FactionsItem. Inputs TeamId FactionsItem Output Bool

item.title: IsInventorySlotActive
item.description: Returns True whether or not the active inventory slot of the target Player is the provided PlayerInventorySlotsItem. Inputs Player PlayerInventorySlotsItem Output Bool

item.title: IsKillerWeapon
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the given HardwareId is equivalent to the provided ability. Inputs HardwareId InventoryPrimaryWeaponsItem | InventorySecondaryWeaponsItem | InventoryCharacterSpecialtiesItem | InventoryOpenGadgetsItem | InventoryThrowablesItem | InventoryMeleeWeaponsItem Output Bool

item.title: IsPlayerUsingSoldier
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the target Player is a specified PlayerSoldiersItem. Inputs Player PlayerSoldiersItem

item.title: IsPlayerValid
item.description: Returns True if the provided Player is valid. Inputs Player Output Bool

item.title: IsTrueForAll
item.description: Returns True if the provided condition is True for every element in the provided Array. Inputs Array Bool Output Bool

item.title: IsTrueForAny
item.description: Returns True if the provided condition is True for at least one element in the provided Array. Inputs Array Bool Output Bool

item.title: IsType
item.description: Returns True if the provided value is equal to the specified TypesItem. Inputs Any Type TypesItem Output Bool

item.title: IsVehicleOccupied
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the target Vehicle is a occupied by a player. Inputs Vehicle Output Bool

item.title: IsVehicleSeatOccupied
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the target seat index Number of target Vehicle is a occupied by a player. Inputs Vehicle Number Output Bool

item.title: IsVictimDamageType
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the victim was damaged by the provided DamageType. Inputs DamageType DamageTypesItem Output Bool

item.title: IsVictimDeathType
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the victim died by the provided DeathType. Inputs DeathType DeathTypesItem Output Bool

item.title: Kill
item.description: Kills a target Player (skips the Mandown state). Inputs Player

item.title: LastOf
item.description: Returns the value at the end of the specified Array. Inputs Array Output Any Type

item.title: LeftVector
item.description: Returns the leftward directional Vector of (-1, 0, 0). Output Vector

item.title: LessThan
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the 1st provided value is less than the 2nd provided value. Inputs Number Number Output Bool

item.title: LessThanEqualTo
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if the 1st provided value is less than or equal to the 2nd provided value. Inputs Number Number Output Bool

item.title: LocalToWorldPosition
item.description: Converts the provided local Player position to the corresponding position in the world space. Inputs Vector (Local Position) Player Output Vector (World Position)

item.title: LocalToWorldVector
item.description: Converts the provided local Player vector to the corresponding vector in the world space. Inputs Vector (Local Vector) Player Output Vector (World Vector)

item.title: LocationalSounds
item.description: Returns a LocationalSoundsItem from the collection of locational sounds. Output LocationalSoundsItem

item.title: LoopVariable
item.description: The start of a series of ACTIONS that will execute in a loop, modifying the control variable on each iteration. If the control Variable reaches or passes the range end value, the loop exits, and execution continues through the remaining ACTIONS in the RULE. Inputs Variable Number (Start) Number (End) Number (Interval)

item.title: MappedArray
item.description: Returns a copy of the provided Array with the values evaluated using the mapped expression provided. The following example utilizes the GetPlayers Array with GetGameModeScore and CurrentArrayElement to return an Array of Player scores. Inputs Array Any Type (Mapped Expression) Output Array

item.title: Maps
item.description: Returns a MapsItem from the collection of all maps. Output MapsItem

item.title: Max
item.description: Returns the greater of the two Number values provided. Inputs Number Number Output Number

item.title: MCOMs
item.description: Returns a MCOMsItem from the collection of all possible MCOMs. Output MCOMsItem

item.title: MCOMStateBool
item.description: Returns the MCOMStateBoolItem of the selected Bool-based MCOM property. Output Bool

item.title: MedGadgetTypes
item.description: Returns a MedGadgetTypesItem from the collection of medical gadget types which can be used with the ApplyMedGadget. Output MedGadgetTypesItem

item.title: Message
item.description: Returns a constructed Message object which can be used with DisplayGameModeMessage, DisplayNotificationMessage, DisplayHighlightedWorldLogMessage, and DisplayCustomMessage. The Message object is created by providing a Number, Player, or format String (which can take up to 3 format items). A format String is a String that contains {} (called braces) within them, which can be substituted for parameters. For example, the String - {} gained {} points! - can be given a Player and Number parameter and could output as John gained 2 points!

item.title: Mod
item.description: Anything you want to work within your custom gamemode must be placed inside this block. You can put blocks you’re working on outside of this block but they will not be executed. You can utilize the space outside the MOD block as a brainstorming area.

item.title: Modulo
item.description: Returns the remainder of the 1st provided value divided by the 2nd provided value. Inputs Number Number Output Number

item.title: Multiply
item.description: Returns the product of two Number values or the product of a Vector and Number value. Inputs Number | Vector Number Output Number | Vector

item.title: Normalize
item.description: Returns a unit-length normalization of a Vector. Inputs Vector Output Vector

item.title: Not
item.description: Return a Bool of the opposite value of the Bool input. Inputs Bool Output Bool

item.title: NotEqualTo
item.description: Returns a Bool indicating if two values are not equal to each other. Inputs Any Type Any Type Output Bool

item.title: Number
item.description: You can enter any numerical value you want here. 1, 2, 3.14, -10.2 Use this block in combination with math blocks to do all sorts of fun mathematical equations.

item.title: Or
item.description: Returns a Bool based on whether either of the two inputs are True. Inputs Bool Bool Output Bool

item.title: PauseGameModeTime
item.description: Pauses or unpauses the gamemode timer based on the provided Bool input. Inputs Bool

item.title: PlayerInventorySlots
item.description: Returns a PlayerInventorySlotsItem from the collection of all available player inventory slots. Output PlayerInventorySlotsItem

item.title: PlayerSoldiers
item.description: Returns a PlayerSoldiersItem from a list of all soldiers. Output PlayerSoldiersItem

item.title: PlayerStateBool
item.description: Returns the PlayerStateBoolItem of the selected Bool-based player property. Output PlayerStateBoolItem

item.title: PlayerStateNumber
item.description: Returns the PlayerStateNumberItem of the selected Number-based player property. Output PlayerStateNumberItem

item.title: PlayerStateVector
item.description: Returns the PlayerStateVectorItem of the selected Vector-based player property. Output PlayerStateVectorItem

item.title: RaiseToPower
item.description: Returns the 1st provided value raised to the power of the 2nd provided value. Inputs Number (Base) Number (Exponent) Output Number

item.title: RandomizedArray
item.description: Returns a copy of the specified Array with the values in a random order. Inputs Array Output Array

item.title: RandomReal
item.description: Returns a random Number between a specified minimum and maximum value (inclusive). Inputs Number (Minimum) Number (Maximum) Output Number

item.title: RandomValueInArray
item.description: Returns a random value from the specified Array. Inputs Array Output Any Type

item.title: RemoveFromArray
item.description: Returns a copy of the specified Array with the provided value removed. Inputs Array Any Type Output Array

item.title: RemovePlayerInventory
item.description: Removes a specified inventory item from a target Player if that item is equipped. Inputs Player InventoryPrimaryWeaponsItem | InventorySecondaryWeaponsItem | InventoryCharacterSpecialtiesItem | InventoryOpenGadgetsItem | InventoryThrowablesItem

item.title: RemovePlayerInventoryAtSlot
item.description: Removes the inventory from a target Player at the provided PlayerInventorySlotsItem. Inputs Player PlayerInventorySlotsItem

item.title: RepairVehicle
item.description: Repairs target Vehicle by the provided Number amount. Note: When repairing a vehicle with a max health multiplier not equal to 1, the amount of health they receive will scale with their max health multiplier value. Inputs Vehicle Number

item.title: ReplacePlayerInventory
item.description: Gives a target Player a new inventory item. Inputs Player InventoryPrimaryWeaponsItem | InventorySecondaryWeaponsItem | InventoryCharacterSpecialtiesItem | InventoryOpenGadgetsItem | InventoryThrowablesItem | InventoryMeleeWeaponsItem

item.title: ResetGameModeTime
item.description: Resets the gamemode time to its starting value.

item.title: Resupply
item.description: Resupplies the target Player using a provided ResupplyTypesItem. Inputs Player ResupplyTypesItem

item.title: ResupplyTypes
item.description: Returns a ResupplyTypesItem from the collection of resupply types which can be used with Resupply. Output ResupplyTypesItem

item.title: RightVector
item.description: Returns the rightward directional Vector of (1, 0, 0). Output Vector

item.title: RoundToInteger
item.description: Returns a whole Number rounded from the input value. The value rounds up if the decimal of the Number is greater than or equal to 0.5, and rounds down if it is less than 0.5. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: Rule
item.description: RULE blocks are triggered from an in-game EVENT. When an EVENT triggers, this block will check if its CONDITION has been met and then execute all of the ACTIONS. Types of RULE Blocks Events Ongoing Ongoing EVENT types continually check if its CONDITION has become True. If so, the ACTIONS will be executed once. In order for the EVENT to execute again, the CONDITION must become False before becoming True again.

item.title: SendErrorReport
item.description: Displays a provided Message as an error in the Admin menu. Inputs Message

item.title: SetCaptureMultiplier
item.description: Sets the capture time multiplier for target CapturePoint to the provided Number. Inputs CapturePoint Number

item.title: SetGameModeScore
item.description: Sets the gamemode score of the provided Player or TeamId. Inputs Player | TeamId Number

item.title: SetGameModeTargetScore
item.description: Sets the gamemode target score used to determine victory. Inputs Number

item.title: SetGameModeTimeLimit
item.description: Sets the duration of the game in seconds. Inputs Number

item.title: SetInventoryAmmo
item.description: Sets the target Player loaded ammo for the provided PlayerInventorySlotsItem. Inputs Player PlayerInventorySlotsItem Number

item.title: SetInventoryMagazineAmmo
item.description: Sets the target Player magazine ammo for the provided PlayerInventorySlotsItem. Inputs Player PlayerInventorySlotsItem Number

item.title: SetMCOMFuseTime
item.description: Sets the fuse time (in seconds) for target MCOM to the provided Number Inputs MCOM Number

item.title: SetNeutralizationTimeMultiplier
item.description: Sets the neutralization time multiplier for target CapturePoint to the provided Number. Inputs CapturePoint Number

item.title: SetObjectiveOwner
item.description: Claims the provided CapturePoint for the specified TeamId. Inputs CapturePoint TeamId

item.title: SetPlayerMaxHealth
item.description: Sets the max health of a target Player from 0 to 1000. Note: The value will be multiplied by the max health multiplier of the that target. Inputs Player Number

item.title: SetPlayerSoldier
item.description: Sets a target Player soldier using a provided PlayerSoldiersItem. The soldier selected should be one that is available from that player team’s faction, otherwise, the soldier will not be set. (ex. if a team’s faction is Bad Company 2 US, that player may only select Bad Company 2 US soldiers). Inputs Player PlayerSoldiersItem

item.title: SetRedeployTime
item.description: Overrides the time to redeploy for a target Player. Note: The redeploy time must be set to a value between 0 and 60 seconds. Inputs Player Number

item.title: SetTeamId
item.description: Sets the target Player team using the provided TeamId. This will force the Player back to the deploy screen. Note: this block is not supported in Free-For-All. Inputs Player TeamId

item.title: SetVariable
item.description: Sets the value of a Variable. Inputs Variable Any Type

item.title: SetVariableAtIndex
item.description: Finds or initializes an Array on a provided Variable, and stores a provided value in that Array at the specified index. Note: The first value in the array starts at an index of 0. Inputs Variable Number (Index) Any Type (Value)

item.title: SetVehicleMaxHealthMultiplier
item.description: Multiplies the maximum health of target Vehicle by the provided Number greater than 0 and less than or equal to 4. Note: The health of a Vehicle is displayed in-game as a percentage. Inputs Vehicle Number

item.title: SetWorldIconImage
item.description: Sets the image property of a WorldIconsItem to the selected WorldIconImagesItem. Inputs WorldIconsItem WorldIconImagesItem

item.title: SetWorldIconOwner
item.description: Sets the owner TeamId of the provided WorldIconsItem. Inputs WorldIconsItem TeamId

item.title: SetWorldIconPosition
item.description: Sets the in-world position of a provided WorldIconsItem. Inputs WorldIconsItem Vector

item.title: SetWorldIconText
item.description: Sets the text property for a provided WorldIconsItem. Inputs WorldIconsItem Message

item.title: SineFromDegrees
item.description: Returns the sine value of a specified angle in degrees. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: SineFromRadians
item.description: Returns the sine value of a specified angle in radians. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: Skip
item.description: Skips a provided number of ACTIONS following this block within this RULE. Inputs Number

item.title: SkipIf
item.description: Skips a provided number of ACTIONS following this block within this RULE if the condition evaluates to True. If it does not, execution continues with the remaining ACTIONS. Inputs Number Bool

item.title: SkipMandown
item.description: Sets the target Player to skip the mandown state and go directly to the deploy screen when killed. Note: By default, SkipMandown is disabled. Inputs Player Bool

item.title: SortedArray
item.description: Returns a sorted version of the specified Array given a Number value to sort by (ascending). CurrentArrayElement can be utilized to represent each value in the Array. In the following example, CurrentArrayElement is used to represent each Player in GetPlayers. GetGameModeScore is used with CurrentArrayElement to return the score, used as a rank, to sort the Array in ascending order. Inputs Array Number (Rank) Output Array

item.title: Sounds
item.description: Returns a SoundsItem from the collection of sounds. Output SoundsItem

item.title: SpotTarget
item.description: Spots a target Player for all players for a specified duration of time (in seconds). Inputs Player Number (Duration)

item.title: SpotTargetForPlayer
item.description: Spots a target Player only for a specified Player for a provided duration of time (in seconds). Inputs Player (Target) Player (Spotter) Number (Duration)

item.title: SquareRoot
item.description: Returns the square root of a provided Number value. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: StopTrackingVariable
item.description: Stops an in-progress tracking of a Variable from the TrackVariableOverTime or TrackVariableAtRate blocks, leaving it at its current value. Inputs Variable

item.title: String
item.description: You can use this block to utilize text within your mod. Team 2s Flag has been Captured! A player has become the Juggernaut. Beware! Phase 3 of your really cool custom mod has started! Note: It’s your responsibility to ensure a safe and fair experience for others, violating the EA User Agreement by using offensive or inappropriate text may result in account bans.

item.title: SUBROUTINE
item.description: SUBROUTINE blocks are special blocks that are similar to RULE blocks, but do not have a designated EVENT. A SUBROUTINE block’s ACTIONS will be executed when called from the RULE block. Like RULE blocks, SUBROUTINE blocks can have a CONDITION to determine whether or not the ACTIONS inside should execute. An important note is payload values, including EventPlayer, EventOtherPlayer, and EventTeam, use the context of the RULE block in which the SUBROUTINE instance block is placed in.

item.title: subroutineInstanceBlock
item.description: Calls a SUBROUTINE block of the same name.

item.title: Subtract
item.description: Returns the difference between two Number values or two Vector values. Inputs Number | Vector Number | Vector Output Number | Vector

item.title: TangentFromDegrees
item.description: Returns the tangent value of a specified angle in degrees. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: TangentFromRadians
item.description: Returns the tangent value of a specified angle in radians. Inputs Number Output Number

item.title: Teleport
item.description: Teleports a target to a provided valid position facing a specified angle (in radians). Inputs Player | Vehicle Vector (Position) Number (Yaw Rotation)

item.title: TrackVariableAtRate
item.description: Gradually modifies the value of a Variable at a specified rate (value/second) until it reaches the provided limit. Note: If the limit is changed later, the Variable will continue to be updated from its previous value. To spot modifying the Variable, use StopTrackingVariable. Inputs Variable Number (Limit) Number (Rate)

item.title: TrackVariableOverTime
item.description: Gradually modifies the value of a Variable over time (in seconds). The variable’s value will reach the limit at the end of the interval. Note: If the limit is changed later, the Variable will continue to be updated from its previous value. To spot modifying the Variable, use StopTrackingVariable. Inputs Variable Number (Limit) Number (Interval)

item.title: TriggerAudio
item.description: Plays a provided SoundsItem or VoiceOversItem to a provided TeamId. Inputs SoundsItem | VoiceOversItem TeamId

item.title: TriggerAudioAtLocation
item.description: Plays a selected LocationalSoundsItem at a specified position. Inputs LocationalSoundsItem Vector

item.title: Types
item.description: Returns a TypesItem from the collection of all object types. Output TypesItem

item.title: UndeployAllPlayers
item.description: Undeploys all players that are alive on the battlefield back to the deploy screen.

item.title: UndeployPlayer
item.description: Undeploys a target Player that is alive on the battlefield back to the deploy screen. Inputs Player

item.title: UnspotTarget
item.description: Unspots a target Player for all players. Inputs Player

item.title: UpVector
item.description: Returns the upward directional Vector of (0, 1, 0). Output Vector

item.title: ValueInArray
item.description: Returns the value found at a provided index of an Array. Inputs Array Number Output Any Type

item.title: Variable
item.description: This block is used to reference a Variable instance. The Variable can be selected by setting the scope - Global , Player, or Team - in the first dropdown, and then selecting the Variable name in the second dropdown. Variable instances can be created or deleted by clicking on the Variables tab, and clicking on Manage Variables.

item.title: VectorTowards
item.description: Returns the displacement Vector from a starting position to an ending position. Inputs Vector (Starting Position) Vector (Ending Position) Output Vector

item.title: Vehicles
item.description: Returns a VehiclesItem from the Vehicle collection. Output VehiclesItem

item.title: VehicleStateVector
item.description: Returns the VehicleStateVectorItem of the selected Vector-based vehicle property. Output VehicleStateVectorItem

item.title: VehicleTypesItem
item.description: Returns a VehicleTypesItem from the collection of all Vehicle types. Output VehicleTypesItem

item.title: VoiceOvers
item.description: Returns a VoiceOversItem from the collection of voice overs. Output VoiceOversItem

item.title: Wait
item.description: Pauses the execution of ACTIONS in a RULE for a provided Number of seconds. Inputs Number

item.title: WaitUntil
item.description: Pauses the execution of ACTIONS in a RULE for a provided Number of seconds or if the provided condition evaluates to True during that interval. Inputs Number Bool

item.title: While
item.description: A block of ACTIONS that will execute in a loop as long as the provided condition is True. Note: You must utilize a Wait block at the beginning or the end of the iteration. Inputs Bool

item.title: WorldIconImages
item.description: Returns a WorldIconImagesItem from the collection of world icon images. Output WorldIconImagesItem

item.title: WorldIcons
item.description: Returns a WorldIconsItem from the collection of world icon entities. Output WorldIconsItem

item.title: WorldToLocalPosition
item.description: Converts the provided world position to the corresponding position in local Player space. Inputs Vector (World Position) Player Output Vector (Local Position)

item.title: WorldToLocalVector
item.description: Converts the provided world vector to the corresponding vector in local Player space. Inputs Vector (World Vector) Player Output Vector (Local Vector)

item.title: Xor
item.description: Returns True if the provided Bool inputs return different values. Inputs Bool Bool Output Bool
